org.gearvrf

Class GVRBoundingBoxShader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.GVRShader
      • org.gearvrf.GVRBoundingBoxShader

  • public class GVRBoundingBoxShader
extends GVRShader
    Renders a bounding box for occlusion query. This shader ignores light sources.
